extendedInfo.description: â© Start a winning streak with the endless-runner that EVERYONE is playing! â©The creators of the hilarious Office Jerk bring you Streaker Run - an exhilarating endless-runner game thatâll test your nerves and your reflexes. Streak down alleys, race through yards and bolt across rooftops. Swipe, jump, turn and slide your way around obstacles.Collect Gems, win Bucks, grab Power-ups and buy Toy Rides to avoid getting beat by the big bruiser whoâs hot on your trail; devoured by a slobbering zombie who's hungry for brains; or tackled by leprechauns who're protecting their gold (LIMITED TIME FOR ST. PATRICK'S DAY).Move quick or get pummeled. Swipe fast or youâll crash!    â Streak for St. Patrick's Day: Leprechauns and rainbows everywhere!    â 5 crazy Power-Ups to help you go the distance    â 4 cool Toy Rides to save your rear    â 9 different Streakers to choose from    â Addictive, endless game play    â Simple swipe and tilt controls for streaking with ease    â Spin To Win for Bucks, Gems, Toy Rides and Power Ups    â Post your scores on Facebook and compete against your friendsIt's not an idol you're swiping from a temple, but it's not far off...Fast-paced and nerve wracking: see how far you can Streak!â¤ Play Streaker Run today!âLikeâ Streaker Run on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/StreakerRun___________________________Streaker Run is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Grumpy Bears, Office Jerk and Plumber Crack. Browse all our games on Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=FluikFollow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.NOTE:To help keep Streaker Run awesome, please send any bug reports or complaints directly to us, instead of posting them in your app reviews. We can reply to app reviews on Google Play, but we're more likely to respond if you post all your bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, http://www.facebook.com/StreakerRun, or email them to us at support@fluik.com

reviews.title: READ
reviews.comment: Despite a recent Update, it still sometimes lags. This IS better than \"Temple Run\" and \"Subway Surfers\". The \'police man in tree\' Photo DOESN\'T Unlock and you don\'t see enough gnomes to unlock the Gnomes Achievement. Also, when you unlock \'full nudity\' with in game Money, he\'s in pants. Please sort it out, Developers.
reviews.author: Leigh Dryden

reviews.comment: I love this game Also its awesome.

reviews.title: Streaker Run
reviews.comment: Funny Fun An Very Interesting
reviews.author: NayNayLaBandasz Ladd

reviews.title: Addictive, but please change a couple things
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty fun. I just REALLY wish \"New High Score\" wouldn\'t pop up right in the middle of the screen while u\'r playing! I\'m on a roll. I\'m super focused. I beat my last score. Then what happens? My vision is blocked, i\'m startled by words suddenly appearing in the middle of my screen, and i run into a bush! How about let me know at the end of that game that i hit a new high score? Also, can the female character have little things she says while she\'s running? All the male characters do. Sexist much?
reviews.author: Marcia Lightfoot

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Guess if u believe in cheating on ur spouse ull love this game.just another poor example of how pathetic we\'ve let ourselves become in a world full of greed hate sexual lust and lies.and people wonder why kids nowadays r so f\'d up.there parents ask them to lie for them and reward them for doing so.punish them for being honest.its time to pray people and hope its  not to late to turn society back to reality.
reviews.author: Joshua Shaw

reviews.title: Best running game for android! by a nexus 7 user
reviews.comment: This game is great. It\'s got a good since of humor, a nice variety of obstacles, nice looking cartoony graphics, gradually speeds up just enough to be challenging but not too fast as to make it frustrating, and runs very smoothly on my Nexus 7 tablet. Streaker Run is just one of those few great games that manages to get it right in every way, which is why it\'s on my home screen with my other most used apps so I don\'t have to go over to my games screen to open it because whenever I want to play a game 90% of the time I want to play Streaker; it\'s just that good.
reviews.author: Alan Sewell

reviews.title: Uninstall imminent.
reviews.comment: Streaking means naked, otherwise the guy is jogging in his undies, not streaking. Regardless of whether he\'s covered by blurry pixels or undies he\'s being censored. I paid for uncensored! Please, we\'re in the 21st century now, leave the annoying pathetic censorship in the 20th century where it belongs. Censorship is ugly, not the human body! Motorola XT925 HD.
reviews.author: Yanwyn Kirby

reviews.title: Funny Game
reviews.comment: The game sucks you in right from the start and is hard to put down. The only complaint that I have with the game along with the other reviews is when your playing the game and you reach a new High Score it  shows on the screen and blocks the game so you cant see what your doing. Very annoying. Other than that its a fun game.
